Articles.Content: I'm not actually new to the game, but it took me a long time to register for the forums. I'm an engineering student, and KSP has been filling what little free time I have since I was introduced to it by a classmate about 5 months ago.
Welcome to the forum! Best online community I've ever encountered.

Welcome to the most polite community so far!

yeea!

Welcome aboard.

I would offer cake, but I suck at cooking.
Welcome to the currently most friendliest corner of the internet. Make your self at home.

Thanks for the warm welcome, folks.

Once finals are over, I'm looking forward to getting back to what's most important -- crashing rockets into Jool.

Welcome aboard.

I would offer cake, but I suck at cooking.

I'd offer cake myself (I can cook), but I seriously doubt it would survive a trip through the mail. Such is life.
